p: After 2 weeks of administration, the model, TPA, and piracetam groups were injected intraperitoneally with LPS (250 Î¼g/kg/day) on day 15, 30 min after treatment with TPA (1, 2 g/kg/day) and piracetam (0.4 g/kg/day). Intraperitoneal injection of LPS continued for an additional week. One hour after the LPS administration on day 16, memory function was assessed using the Morris water maze (MWM) test for 6 consecutive days (for the time line of drug treatment and experimental schedule, see Figure S6).
